actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain farm vehicles from the highway use tax, and to require that evidence of payment of such tax be shown on highway motor vehicles subject to tax.

summary.text: Exempts specified farm vehicles from the highway use tax under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require that evidence of payment of such tax be shown on highway motor vehicles subject to tax by affixing a windshield sticker to such vehicles. (Adss 26 U.S.C. 4483(d), 4481(f))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain farm vehicles from the highway use tax, and to require that evidence of payment of such tax be shown on highway motor vehicles subject to tax.
